document.full_text: montana's medical marijuana law was used to conceal large-scale drug trafficking by pot dispensaries and growers raided in 13 cities across the state, federal prosecutors said on tuesday.
document.title: montana medical pot suppliers accused of trafficking
lines_and_colors: montana's medical marijuana law was used to conceal large-scale drug trafficking by pot dispensaries and growers raided in 13 cities across the state, federal prosecutors said on tuesday.
